relevant_findings.respiratory: Labored respirations using accessory muscles. Fine mid-to-late inspiratory crackles throughout both lung fields, most prominent at the bases. No wheezing or rhonchi.
relevant_findings.cardiac: Tachycardia with a regular rhythm, no murmurs detected.
relevant_findings.extremities: No clubbing, cyanosis, or edema in the arms or legs.
relevant_findings.other: Abdominal, neurologic, musculoskeletal, and cutaneous examinations were normal.
